Open bioshock.ini with a text editor     Anisotropic filtering   Anisotropic filtering (AF)[edit]      Turn Horizontal FOV Lock on in-game. Full controller support Controller remapping Controller Y-axis inversion Mouse acceleration[edit]  Instructions Open User.ini with a text editor Find the following lines and edit them accordingly: [Default] W=MoveForward | set Engine.PlayerInput MouseAccelThreshold
